verses.name: Job 8:13
verses.text: So are the paths of all that forget God; and the hypocrite’s hope shall perish:

verses.name: Job 8:14
verses.text: Whose hope shall be cut off, and whose trust shall be a spider’s web.

verses.name: Job 8:15
verses.text: He shall lean upon his house, but it shall not stand: he shall hold it fast, but it shall not endure.

verses.name: Job 8:16
verses.text: He is green before the sun, and his branch shooteth forth in his garden.

verses.name: Job 8:17
verses.text: His roots are wrapped about the heap, and seeth the place of stones.

verses.name: Job 8:18
verses.text: If he destroy him from his place, then it shall deny him, saying, I have not seen thee.
